attr.title: October Panic
attr.desc: An arcade-style platformer with five levels and no saving/loading. A small trick-or-treat bag packed to the brim with both treats and tricks.
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3165420/October_Panic/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
